posts.title: Brushless motor model and disassembly animation
posts.text: ↑Showcase your products like above as well. </> ⬇Download Report This is a three-phase brushless motor model with motor disassembly animation. A disassembly animation shows its internal structure. GEOMETRY Triangles 1.1k Quads 59.7k Polygons 155 Total triangles 121.5k License: CC Attribution Creative Commons Attribution Credit the Creator: "Brushless motor model and disassembly animation" by Belzar Sirus is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution. MORE INFOMATION PBR No Textures 0 Materials 10 UV Layers Yes Vertex colors No Animations 1 Rigged geometries No Morph geometries 0 Scale transformations No document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () { // 可以在这里添加更多的展示文本选项 var textOptions = [ '↑Showcase your products like above as well.', '3D product showcase solution on web.', 'Showcase your products in all directions.', 'Interactive product display experience.', 'Online 3D product showcase.', 'Advanced product display solutions.', 'Product display solutions in the future.', // 添加更多的文本选项 ]; // 随机选择一个文本 var randomText = textOptions[Math.floor(Math.random() * textOptions.length)]; // 将随机选择的文本设置为链接的文本内容 document.getElementById('randomTextLink').textContent = randomText; }); function copyLink() { // 这里添加复制链接的逻辑，可以使用 document.execCommand() 或者 Clipboard API // 下面是一个简单的例子，仅供参考，实际使用时可能需要更复杂的逻辑 var linkToCopy = "https://models.joydesign3d.link/assets/Brushless-motor-model-and-disassembly-animation/brushless_motor/scene.gltf"; // 创建一个临时的textarea元素，并将链接放入其中 var tempTextarea = document.createElement("textarea"); tempTextarea.value = linkToCopy; // 将textarea添加到DOM中 document.body.appendChild(tempTextarea); // 选择textarea中的文本 tempTextarea.select(); tempTextarea.setSelectionRange(0, 99999); /* For mobile devices */ // 尝试执行复制命令 document.execCommand("copy"); // 从DOM中移除临时的textarea元素 document.body.removeChild(tempTextarea); // 提示用户链接已复制 alert("Model link copied!"); }
posts.author: joydesign3d
